product.longDescription: A tall, strong, vegetative plant, Sprinter remains productive through adverse weather. Benefits from at least some heat, but produces high yields of beautiful, large, dark red fruits through a variety of conditions. Excellent flavor. High resistance to tobamovirus races 0-3. Avg. 3,650 seeds/oz. Mini: 10 seeds. Packet: 25 seeds.
product.shortDescription: Blocky red bell for heated and unheated tunnel production.
